page.title: 01CANVEY ISLAND
page.content: The block we surveyed is a varied terrain comprising an area of high density housing to the South East, an area of marshland pasture embanked by sea walls to the South and North West, an ares of saltings the North side of the pastureland, an area including the tidal Benfleet Creek and {flood barrier}to the North a lake in an urban setting and derelict land to the immediate North of Winter Gardens. {Canvey Island,}being below sea level is a flat alluvial plain and such has to be drained by diches and embanked by sea walls.It is ideal for playing fields and cyclists. The soil is heavy clay.
